subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which was the capital of the Mewar Kingdom?
question_hi: मैयार क्षेत्र के राजधानी क्या था?
explanation_en:
Udaipur was the capital of the Mewar Kingdom during the time of Maharana Pratap.
In Hindi: Udaipur मैयारा क्षेत्र के राजधानी बच्चना महाराणा प्रतीक्षमान के विस्तर्थ
explanation_hi: मैयारा क्षेत्र के राजधानी बच्चना महाराणा प्रतीक्षमान के विस्तर्थ
question_en: Which ruler's reign marked the establishment of Mewar Kingdom?
Whose reign established the Mewar Kingdom?
